title: 1895 N300 Mayo's Cut Plug John Ward - SGC 2.5
author: benedini

posts.post_title: 1895 N300 Mayo's Cut Plug John Ward - SGC 2.5
posts.post_content:
1895 Mayo's Cut Plug (N300) John Ward Graded SGC 2.5 - for corner rounding and overall wear. Free of any creases or wrinkles, nice eye appeal.

Super scarce card here - SGC population of 1 with only 3 graded higher and 7 graded in total. 

$SOLD Thank you including delivery - reasonable offers considered

eBay user ID megalodonteeth - multiple successful sales on Net54
